title: Selfie

verbs: To telephone, to call someone on the telephone.
To contact someone using the telephone.
Get or try to get into communication (with someone) by telephone
To contact someone by dialing his or her telephone number; to make someone's telephone ring using one's own telephone.
nouns: A digital video device that is used for recording moving images and audio in a digital format.
An app to facilitate the capture of photos and videos by using the PC.
Device for recording or transmitting photographic images or videos
A camera is an optical instrument that records images that can be stored directly, transmitted to another location, or both.
Equipment for taking photographs (usually consisting of a lightproof box with a lens at one end and light-sensitive film at the other)
A Windows Phone application that is both a digital still camera and a digital video camera.
A selfie is a self-portrait photograph, typically taken with a hand-held digital camera or camera phone.
A photograph taken by the person photographed.
Self-portrait, usually informal
A photographic self-portrait, especially one taken manually (not using a timer, tripod etc.) with a small camera or mobile phone.

An item the user can select in the Options dialog box, Phones tab, from the "Select the default device for calling phone numbers" drop-down list. When the user selects Phone as the default device for calling phone numbers, Communicator uses the PBX phone integrated with Communicator for making a call.
An electronic device used for two-way talking with other people (often shortened to phone).
Telecommunications device
A telephone, or phone, is a telecommunications device that permits two or more users to conduct a conversation when they are not in the same vicinity of each other to be heard directly.
A traditional phone, which has a wired connection (as opposed to a mobile phone).
An electronic device used for two-way talking with other people.
An electronic device used for calling people.
A device for transmitting conversations and other sounds in real time across distances.
Electronic equipment that converts sound into electrical signals that can be transmitted over distances and then converts received signals back into sounds
Also known as "the horn", especially among soldiers and police officers

description: A mobile phone held up to take a selfie (photo of the person holding the phone or camera). Generally represented as a disembodied arm holding a mobile phone.
apple_vendor_description: The 'selfie' emoji on Apple devices is a playful and modern representation of capturing a moment. It features a hand holding a smartphone, angled as if taking a picture of oneself, with a distinctively Apple-esque clean and glossy finish. The soft, rounded edges and realistic lighting give the device and hand a tangible quality, making this emoji a fun way to signify self-expression, social sharing, or a spontaneous photo opportunity.
